creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
description: two parts handsewn together; upper smaller blue part with geometric embroidery in yellow, shades of red, white and black, bordered with machine embroidered scalloped edge in red and green; lower part overall geometric embroidery in green, red, and blue, surrounded by bright pink silk border; PL top corner has pink insert
title: Baby Carrier
